DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response survival patient peritoneal carcinomatosis treat cytoreductive surgery plus intraoperative peritoneal hyperthermic chemotherapy cisplatin mitomycin - Assess quality life patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : Patients randomize IPHC group control group . In former group , patient undergo cytoreductive surgery plus intraoperative hyperthermic peritoneal perfusion cisplatin mitomycin 60 minute . Patients control group underwent routine cytoreductive surgery . All patient group receive standard conventional chemotherapy surgery . Quality life assess study initiation , 1 , 3 , 6 month . Patients follow 4 week , every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 3 year .
DOC.brief_title: Surgery Plus Intraoperative Peritoneal Hyperthermic Chemotherapy ( IPHC ) Treat Peritoneal Carcinomatosis
DOC.detailed_description: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : - Histologically confirm peritoneal carcinomatosis follow histology : - Primary peritoneal mesothelioma - Adenocarcinoma gastrointestinal tract origin - Confined peritoneal cavity - Tumor mass could debulked less 2.5 cm diameter per tumor deposit - Must fail prior intraperitoneal platinum therapy - Treatment failure define radiographic evidence disease progression 2 consecutive CT scan within 3 month therapy PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : - 20 70 year old Performance status : - KPS > 50 Life expectancy : - More 8 week Hematopoietic : - WBC least 3,500/mm^3 - Platelet count least 80,000/mm^3 Hepatic : - Bilirubin great 2 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) - AST ALT great 2 time ULN - Liver enzymes great 2 time ULN Renal : - Creatinine great 1.5 mg/dL Cardiovascular : - No significant irreversible cardiac ischemia - No significant change ECG record Pulmonary : - FEV_1 least 1.2 liter - Maximum voluntary ventilation least 50 % expect Other : - Not pregnant nursing - Negative pregnancy test - No concurrent medical problem would preclude surgery
